import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ProfileService } from './profile.service'; import { IResponse, IResume } from '../interfaces/appUser'; import { AccountService } from '../services/account.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile.component.scss'], }) export class ProfileComponent implements OnInit { resume?: IResume; profileInfo?: IResponse; displayName: string | null = localStorage.getItem('DisplayName'); flag = false; constructor(private accountService: AccountService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getResume(); this.getProfileInfo(); } getResume() { this.accountService.getResume().subscribe({ next: (data) => { this.resume = data; console.log(this.resume); }, }); } getProfileInfo() { const token = localStorage.getItem('TOKEN'); if (token) { this.accountService.getLoginInfo(token)?.subscribe({ next: (data) => { this.profileInfo = data; console.log(data); }, }); } } openModal() { this.flag = true; } closeModal() { this.flag = false; } }
